metadata.synopsis: Malek Stones is a paranoic investigative journalist for the Baldurs Mouth. Short dialog to add a little extra life to the office and make it seem busy. If Ettvard Needle is dead, Malek briefly explains he is promoted up to the new head of the paper.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Malek Stones in the Baldurs Mouth Writing Room.

1.speaker: Malek Stones
1.text: Gortash knew what was going on, and they got him. I'll prove it yet.

0.speaker: Malek Stones
0.text: Now I just need to figure out who 'they' are...

2.speaker: Malek Stones
2.text: Damn it damn it DAMN IT! Still missing one link... Oi, shove off! Don't you be peeking at my scoop!

3.speaker: Malek Stones
3.text: The truth cannot be interrupted, stop wasting my time!

4.speaker: Malek Stones
4.text: Hey, look, I saw nothing. Far as I'm concerned, Ettvard just dropped dead. No foul play here. Pleasepleaseplease don't hurt me.

5.speaker: Malek Stones
5.text: Too busy to chat, civilian. I've a paper to run - the truth will finally be spread!
